items.title: The Orion Nebula in Infrared
items.explanation: This infrared image reveals stars forming deep inside the Orion Nebula.

items.title: Spiral Galaxy NGC 4414
items.explanation: A nearly perfect spiral galaxy seen face-on from Earth.

items.title: Aurora Over Northern Lights
items.explanation: Colorful auroras ripple across polar skies after a solar storm.

items.title: The Pillars of Creation
items.explanation: Towering columns of gas inside the Eagle Nebula.

items.title: Jupiter and Its Moons
items.explanation: A detailed view of Jupiter and four Galilean moons.

items.title: Milky Way Over Desert Dunes
items.explanation: The Milky Way arches over sand dunes in a remote desert.

items.title: Sunspots and Solar Flares
items.explanation: Active regions on the Sun produce dramatic solar flares.
